list.name: KICK-PUSH
list.description: While near walls Ollie kicks off his hoverboard and gains x% extra movement speed.
list.descriptionHtml: While near walls Ollie kicks off his hoverboard and gains x% extra movement speed.

list.name: RENEGADE
list.description: After dashing forward with his Super, Ollie gains a x decaying shield over x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: After dashing forward with his Super, Ollie gains a x decaying shield over x seconds.
